content: **cozy cardi crochet pattern** wrap yourself in the warmth and style of the cozy cardi this beginner-friendly crochet pattern is perfect for those ready to create their first handmade garment designed with simplicity in mind the cardigan features a big granny square construction making it accessible for all skill levels the pattern uses basic double_crochet stitches with clear step-by-step instructions to guide you through every round with adorable cuffs a cozy collar and charming sleeves this cardigan is both functional and stylish ideal for lounging at home or a casual day out the cozy cardi is versatile and customizable to your favorite colors **what s included ** * step-by-step written instructions in plain english * video tutorial to walk you through tricky parts * sizing guidelines to make the perfect fit * option to customize colors for your unique style **materials needed ** * approximately 750g worsted weight 4 yarn in up to 3 colors * 6 5mm crochet hook or 6mm as an alternative * needle scissors and stitch markers whether you re just getting started or looking for a relaxing project the ** cozy cardi 1 ** is your next must-make crochet item find inspiration and support on the secret yarnery youtube channel and join a community of crocheters sharing their creations start your cozy cardi today ✅ free pattern https //bit ly/3dayxui ✅ printable pdf pattern https //bit ly/3o5bmob ✅ right handed tutorial https //youtu be/s1u61iir7dq ✅ left handed tutorial https //youtu be/6kcjbhg9iou
